meanings.definition: The quality or state of not being random.
meanings.sent1: The nonrandomnesses of the patterns in the fabric made it easy to spot the counterfeit.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the nonrandomnesses in the data to uncover hidden trends.
meanings.sent3: The nonrandomnesses of the jumbled puzzle pieces made it impossible to solve.
meanings.sent4: The nonrandomnesses of the stars aligned perfectly to form a constellation.
meanings.sent5: The nonrandomnesses of the fingerprints left a clear trail for the detective to follow.

meanings.sent1: The nonrandomnesses in the lottery draw raised suspicions of foul play.
meanings.sent2: The nonrandomnesses of the shuffled cards led to an unfair game.
meanings.sent3: The nonrandomnesses of the weather forecast made everyone bring an umbrella, just in case.
meanings.sent4: The nonrandomnesses of the traffic lights seemed to conspire against the driver.
meanings.sent5: The nonrandomnesses of the test questions made it difficult for students to predict the answers.
